result.title: DFS (Depth First Search)
result.content:
Biror bir uchdan unga bog'langan barcha ko'rish

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int>p[100001];
bool used[100001];
void dfs(int v)
{
    cout<<"vertex in "<<v<<endl;
    used[v]=1;
    for(int i=0;i<p[v].size();i++)
    {
        int to=p[v][i];
        if(used[to]==0)
        {
            dfs(to);
        }
    }
    cout<<"vertex out "<<v<<endl;
}
main()
{
    int n,m,v1,v2;
    cin>>n>>m;

    for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        cin>>v1>>v2;
        p[v1].push_back(v2);
        p[v2].push_back(v1);
    }
    int v;
    cin>>v;
    dfs(v);
}
/*
11 11
1 2
1 3
1 4
2 7
7 8
8 9
9 11
8 10
3 6
3 4
4 5


8 3
*/
kirish va chiqish vaqtlari

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
const int MX=1e5;
vector<int>p[MX];
bool used[MX];
int time_in[MX];
int time_out[MX];
int timer;
bool is_fath(int v1 , int fath)
{
    return time_in[fath]<time_in[v1] && time_out[fath]>time_out[v1];
}
void dfs(int v)
{
    time_in[v]=++timer;
    used[v]=1;
    for(int i=0;i<p[v].size();i++)
    {
        int to=p[v][i];
        if(used[to]==0)
        {
            dfs(to);
        }
    }
    time_out[v]=++timer;
}
main()
{
    int n,m,v1,v2;
    cin>>n>>m;

    for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        cin>>v1>>v2;
        p[v1].push_back(v2);
        p[v2].push_back(v1);
    }
    int components=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(used[i]==0)
        {
            dfs(i);
            components++;
        }
    }
    cout<<components<<endl;
    while(1)
    {
        cin>>v1>>v2;
        if(is_fath(v1,v2))
        {
            cout<<"FATHER";
        }
        else cout<<"NOT FATH";
        cout<<endl;
    }
}
/*
20 13
1 2
1 3
1 4
2 7
7 8
8 9
9 11
8 10
3 6
3 4
4 5
12 13
12 14

8 3
*/
grafni siklga tekshirish

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
const int MX=1e5;
vector<int>p[MX];
bool used[MX];
int time_in[MX];
int time_out[MX];
int timer;
int col[MX];
bool is_fath(int v1 , int fath)
{
    return time_in[fath]<time_in[v1] && time_out[fath]>time_out[v1];
}
void dfs(int v , int par)
{
    time_in[v]=++timer;
    col[v]=1;
    for(int i=0;i<p[v].size();i++)
    {
        int to=p[v][i];
        if(col[to]==0)
        {
            dfs(to,v);
        }
        else if(col[to]==1 && par!=to && par!=-1)
        {
            cout<<"Cycle!";
            exit(0);
        }
    }
    col[v]=2;
    time_out[v]=++timer;
}
main()
{
    int n,m,v1,v2;
    cin>>n>>m;

    for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        cin>>v1>>v2;
        p[v1].push_back(v2);
        p[v2].push_back(v1);
    }
    int components=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(used[i]==0)
        {
            dfs(i,-1);
            components++;
        }
    }
    cout<<"NO Cycle!";
    return 0;
    cout<<components<<endl;
    while(1)
    {
        cin>>v1>>v2;
        if(is_fath(v1,v2))
        {
            cout<<"FATHER";
        }
        else cout<<"NOT FATH";
        cout<<endl;
    }
}

8 3

topologic sort

#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
const int MX=1e5;
vector<int>p[MX];
bool used[MX];
vector<int>top_sort;
void dfs(int v)
{
    used[v]=1;
    for(int i=0;i<p[v].size();i++)
    {
        int to=p[v][i];
        if(used[to]==0)
        {
            dfs(to);
        }
    }
    top_sort.push_back(v);
}
main()
{
    int n,m,v1,v2;
    cin>>n>>m;

    for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        cin>>v1>>v2;
        p[v1].push_back(v2);
        p[v2].push_back(v1);
    }
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(used[i]==0)
        {
            dfs(i);
        }
    }
    reverse(top_sort.begin() , top_sort.end());
    for(int i=0;i<top_sort.size();i++)
    {
        cout<<top_sort[i]<<" ";
    }
}
